unnormalised: Haanv sangtam, mhozo ixtt Rahul Linear Algebra porikshek lagun bhivon sod’dalo. Tannem mhoc vhodd ratri 11 voram vellar phone kelo ani 3x3 matrixacho inverse sodun kaddpak lagun voishon asta mhonn sanglo. Distach, tache Prof. Sharma hannim taka ek vhodd problem dila zantunt sqrt(2) ani pi/4 asle! Hanvem taka sanglem, "Bhai, fattim rav! Tu Chandrayaan-4 che trajectory kadinai. Fattim Gauss-Jordan elimination vapar...vo kiteim tori konnak tori bribe di zaka hea vixoyant gom asa!" To khushi naslo. Mhaka umed asa to pass zatolo. Na zalear taka Goa vochk zai asa te adim korche poddtelem.
normalised: Boro, mhazo ixtt Rahul Linear Algebra porikshekhatir trasan poddlo. Tannem mhojek ratchea eleven vaztam phone kelo ani tin by tin matrixacho inverse sodun kaddpak lagun to bhaybhit zallo. Dislam ki tachea Professor Sharma-n taka square root of two ani pi divided by four ashi ghoddhoni asli problem dili! Hanvem taka sanglem, "Bhai, just chill! Tum Chandrayaan-four khatir trajectory calculate korinasai. Fakt Gauss-Jordan elimination vapar... vo anik borem, konnak tori bribe di jiachea lagim hem zannvai asa!" Taka hansonk ailem na. Umedh asa to pass zatolo. Na zalear taka tache Goa plan prepon korche poddtele.

Distach, tache Prof. Sharma hannim taka ek vhodd problem dila zantunt sqrt(2) ani pi/4 asle! Hanvem taka sanglem, "Bhai, fattim rav! Tu Chandrayaan-4 che trajectory kadinai. Fattim Gauss-Jordan elimination vapar...vo kiteim tori konnak tori bribe di zaka hea vixoyant gom asa!" To khushi naslo. Mhaka umed asa to pass zatolo. Na zalear taka Goa vochk zai asa te adim korche poddtelem.
